name: OpenFunnel
long_description:
Developers have scattered yet heavy touchpoints that represent adoption and buying intent. We aggregate and make sense of these interactions across open and closed developer channels using AI Agents.

This enables us to monitor dev tool adoption and generate highly qualified developer leads that we enrich and update in real time. 

GTM Teams & Founders use us to sell better.
one_liner: We help DevTool Companies find & sell to their most engaged users
